bootcamp

Is the bootcamp right for me?

The bootcamp is right for you if you have an interest in data and a desire to learn. Previous programming experience in any language is ideal but not strictly required. Applicants will be judged primarily on their drive and willingness to succeed in a career as a data engineer.

How To Apply

send an email to apply@bradflaugher.com with the following:
ðŸ’“ Explain your love for data, math, or why you are excited to be a data scientist.
ðŸ¤“ Are you ok being a nerd? Tell a short nerdy story about yourself, what is the "nerdiest" personal project you have worked on?
ðŸ”— Please include links to your linkedin and github profiles if you have them.

What happens next?

After your application has been reviewed you will get an email (usually within 2 weeks), if accepted you will be sent the bootcamp contract with payment terms and expectations. you may email apply@bradflaugher.com with any questions.

How much does it cost?

It depends on how good of a job you land after class. If you get a job for $100k(USD) annual salary or over you'll pay full price for the bootcamp, which is about $10k. If you get a job between $80k-100k you'll pay a prorated rate depending on your pay. If you land a job that pays under $80k you'll pay only the nonrefundable deposit you paid to hold your space and secure delivery of your books and laptop (about $2k).

We aim to maintain competitive pricing, and research salaries as well as competitor bootcamps regularly, we are happy to share this reseach to help you make a decision to attend or not. Below are some of our competitor's websites, their bootcamps often cost $12-17k and require upfront payment, we want to bring new smart people into data engineering so aim to provide a lower cost bootcamp with tuition payable after you get a job, if you have any questions about this please email apply@bradflaugher.com
